rukus.text: ‘‘ninu nanage adesisiruvudara horatu berenannu nanu avarige helilla. – Nanna odeyanu nim'ma odeyanu agiruva allahananne aradhisiri (endaste nanu helidde). Nanu avara naduve iddastu kala avara visayadalli nane saksiyagidde. Taruvaya ninu nannannu melettikonda balika nine avara melvicarakanagidde. Ninantu pratiyondu visayakku saksiyagiruve’’
‘‘niniga avarannu siksisuvudadare, avaru ninna dasaru. Innu ninu avarannu ksamisuvudadare ninantu pracandanu, yuktivantanu agiruve’’

Allahanu heluvanu; indina dinavu satyavantarige avara satyavu labhavodagisuva dinavagide. Avarigagi, tala bhagadalli nadigalu hariyuttiruvantaha totagalive. Avaru sadakala avugalalliruvaru. Allahanu avarinda santustanadanu mattu avaru allahaninda santustaradaru. Iduve maha vijaya
akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala malakatvavu allahanige seride. Avanantu ellavannu madaballanu

ella prasanse allahanige. Avane, akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu srstisidavanu mattu kattalugalannu hagu belakannu rupisidavanu. Istagiyu dhikkarigalu (an'yarannu) tam'ma odeyanige samanarendu pariganisuttare
